explains: n. 生物，有机体，（尤指）微生物；有机组织，有机体系
wordGroup: pathogenic organism 致病（病原）生物

sentences.en: Simple antibiotics are effective against this organism.
sentences.cn: 普通的抗生素就能够有效地抑制这种微生物。

sentences.en: Multiplication of cells leads to rapid growth of the organism.
sentences.cn: 细胞的繁殖导致有机体的迅速生长。

sentences.en: DNA carries the genetic blueprint which tells any organism how to build itself.
sentences.cn: 脱氧核糖核酸带有决定有机体形成方式的遗传型板。
